name: 601 - Snakebite - Toro
additionalNotes: Handmade at Espinosa Cigarâ€™s legendary La Zona factory in Nicaragua, the 601 Snakebite has a dark, toothy Ecuadorian Sumatra wrapper that is skillfully coiled around a Nicaraguan binder, which houses long-filler tobaccos from Nicaragua. A medium to full-bodied stick, the 601 Snakebite has notes spice, pepper, leather and espresso.
